issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
No. I am just reading the documentation and assuming that it is providing values. 

You will need to monitor that topic while you are walking. I am assuming that it will only produce messages as a part of the walking mechanism.

You know what they say about assuming.
